title: Iverns Ult
body: I'm not sure if anyone has mentioned this yet so I figured I would send out my own complaint. I really like ivern so far after watching streams of him, but why is such a unique original champion being stuck out with such a generic ult? I mean he is literally called the friend of the forest. he goes around freeing jungle camps, why is his ult just rock tibbers? it even looks like the same model as tibbers with some flowers pasted on. I would love to see some sort of interaction with jungle besides his passive. Like summoning the camps to take revenge or help him out in some way. Individually his skills are neat and unique but all together it seems to lack some cohesiveness. Like he makes brush but only his autos change while in them. Just my opinions on it whats everyone else think?

replies.body:
woah, woah woah,

First.

Stop calling Daisy a pet. She has feelings too.

Second. 

Daisy is Pere Vert's long time friend and protector. she arguably is the most thematic skill on his kit.

Third. 

Pere Vert is likely going to be most effective with a rabadon's (and what ever that comes with). he is supposed to be supportive. a dmg ult would not represent that as much as a front line and friend that scales with ap (like Daisy). 

Fourth.

Its pretty clear Pere Vert's magic is focused around plant growth. how do you explain clearing red or blue and then using summoning/reanimation/reincarnation magic? i can understand Daisy growing from the ground as another plant or something, but a plant growth ult already sounds too similar to a botanist i know of.

As it stands, having an over protective golem pop up when needed fits him fine. she even says bye after helping. how friendly of her.
